name: common-libs/io
description: SimpleDirLister is a php lib and a fronted of these lib. You can get complete filetrees and informations about files. You can also show these infos in a clean way

suggest.league/flysystem-rackspace: Allows you to use Rackspace Cloud Files
suggest.league/flysystem-copy: Allows you to use Copy.com storage
suggest.league/flysystem-azure: Allows you to use Windows Azure Blob storage
suggest.league/flysystem-webdav: Allows you to use WebDAV storage
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v2: Allows you to use S3 storage with AWS SDK v2
suggest.league/flysystem-aws-s3-v3: Allows you to use S3 storage with AWS SDK v3
suggest.league/flysystem-dropbox: Allows you to use Dropbox storage
suggest.league/flysystem-cached-adapter: Flysystem adapter decorator for metadata caching
suggest.league/flysystem-sftp: Allows you to use SFTP server storage via phpseclib
suggest.league/flysystem-ziparchive: Allows you to use ZipArchive adapter
